name: Nostalgic Neon Repair
description:
The neon lights are failing all over Neon City!

The game was made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2020 at the Hamar jam site in Norway.

How to play:

Collect repair kits (blue), and drive through the repair spots (green) to repair the failing neon buildings. Choose what lane to move into by using the "A" and "D" keys.

You can select between Repair Mode and Cruising Mode. Repair Mode is the standard game play, while Cruising Mode simply lets you cruise through the city without any objective.

You can also choose to play both these modes with or without music, so you can have your own favorite tracks playing in the background.

The game keeps going for an endless loop, and there is no win state.
